title: SPIRIT DIVINE, ATTEND OUR PRAYER
bible_ref: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting. Acts 2:2
verses: Spirit divine, attend our prayers,=And make our heart Thy home;=Descend with all Thy gracious power;=Come, Holy Spirit, come!.
Come as the Light: to us reveal=Our emptiness and woe;=And lead us in those paths of life=Where all the righteous go.
Come as the fire and purge our hearts=Like sacrificial flame,=Let our whole souls an offering be=To our Redeemerâ€™s name.
Come as the Dew, and sweetly bless=This consecrated hour=May barrenness rejoice to own=Thy fertilizing power.
Come as the Dove, and spread Thy wings=The wings of perfect love=And let Thy Church on earth become=Blest as the Church above.
Spirit Divine, attend our prayers;=Make a lost world Thy home;=Descend with all Thy gracious powers=Oh, come, Great Spirit, come!
